WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed, sort of...The execCommand "fontsize" doesn't work in Safari, and it doesn't support "increaseFontSize" or "decreaseFontSize", so consiquentially the work around to get this working was to wrap the current selection in <span> tags with the css font-size set to "smaller" or "larger" appropriately. This isn't the ideal solution but it works.
